articles.author: DIDI TANG
articles.title: Many Americans have come to rely on Chinese-made drones. Now lawmakers want to ban them - The Associated Press
articles.description: The economic and technological rivalry between the U.S. and China has come to the drone market, where Chinese-made flying devices are a dominant player in America. Lawmakers in Washington are seeking to ban new sales of Chinese-made drones, arguing they could…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) Russell Hedrick, a North Carolina farmer, flies drones to spray fertilizers on his corn, soybean and wheat fields at a fraction of what it would cost him to use a conventional ground … [+10377 chars]

articles.title: CES 2025: What to Expect From the Massive Tech Bonanza - CNET
articles.description: CNET's experts have decades of experience bringing one of the biggest technology events on the planet straight to you.
articles.content: CNET is going to Las Vegas and we're taking you with us. While many of you will be enjoying a slow start to the new year, we're diving headfirst into 2025 by making our first stop CES, the big kahuna… [+10212 chars]
